name: Total Grid Community
tagline: Dedicated To Enabling A Smarter Energy Grid
body:
### Welcome to the Total Grid Community
An open source community dedicated to enabling a smarter energy grid.    

[Green Energy Corp](http://www.greenenergycorp.com/index.html) is pleased to sponsor this Community and looks forward to continued partnership with open source developers world-wide. The Total Grid open source ecosystem expands the resources of smart grid problem-solvers to a global community and allows contributors to innovate.

### Latest Message
March 27, 2013 - It has been a long pull over the last feel years and we are making some headway in development and our focus that we are excited to share with you.  Thanks for the support and stay tuned.

### New Project in the Pipeline: 
[Reef GUI] (scheduled for Q2 2013)  -  This is a replacement for the Remote CLI in Reef.  We leverage Play and AngularJS to provide a graphical view of Reef's model and attributes.  The first release is read only. Our purpose for moving this way was two fold -  fast development and an intuitive user interface.   It is fairly simple but works. 

### Featured Community projects:

[REEF](https://github.com/gec/Total-Grid/wiki/Reef)

[DNP3](https://github.com/gec/Total-Grid/wiki/DNP3)

### Read More on the [Wiki](https://github.com/gec/Total-Grid/wiki)

[Join our mailing list for the latest news and updates](support@totalgrid.org)
